title: S3 - Lambda - Comprehend Batch sentiment analysis CDK
description: Perform batch sentiment analysis using Comprehend through Lambda and S3

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This patterns shows CDK deployment on how to leverage Amazon S3, AWS Lambda, Amazon DynamoDB, and Amazon Comprehend to perform Batch Sentiment Analysis in a serverless fashion.
See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.

authors.name: Arjun Arippa
